title: Tinder logo
content:
Hi good people.

Can you ID the font used in the Tinder logo.

I suspect an altered font or a custom type.

Merci!

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [tinder-logo.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221091135/http:/typophile.com/files/tinder-logo.jpg) | 37.67 KB |
author: Shawali

comments.content:
Custom and without too much thinking from [Helvetica Neue](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221091135/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neue-helvetica)

EDIT: stand corrected and revised my hasty judgement. You could go with [Chalet](http://web.archive.org/web/20150221091135/http:/www.houseind.com/fonts/chalet) New York 1970.
